title: 5 Earnings Reports for Assessing Global Growth
text:
Recession fears are prevalent. Manufacturing indexes, for instance, are showing no growth, or worse. What’s more, the Dow Jones Industrial Average has dropped for three straight weeks and seven out of the last 10. Investor angst is palpable. Perhaps earnings can save the market.

As earnings reports roll in, here are five industrial companies investors can watch to divine the health of the global economy: Fastenal (ticker: FAST), Honeywell (HON), Caterpillar (CAT), Cognex (CGNX) and Emerson Electric (EMR).

...
description: For investors worried about the health of the global economy, earnings from five industrial company can help them divine the direction of the economy in the year ahead.
